column2: Formulate an ontology related to language. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology/language#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .:Language a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Language" .:NaturalLanguage a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Natural Language" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Language .:ProgrammingLanguage a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Programming Language" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Language .:HumanLanguage a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Human Language" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :NaturalLanguage .:ConstructedLanguage a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Constructed Language" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :NaturalLanguage .:Family a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Language Family" .:IndoEuropean a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Indo-European Language" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Family .:RomanceLanguage a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Romance Language" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :IndoEuropean .:GermanicLanguage a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Germanic Language" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :IndoEuropean .:hasLanguageFamily a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has language family" ;    rdfs:domain :NaturalLanguage ;    rdfs:range :Family .:isSpokenBy a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "is spoken by" ;    rdfs:domain :NaturalLanguage ;    rdfs:range :Human .:hasScript a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has script" ;    rdfs:domain :NaturalLanguage ;    rdfs:range :Script .:English a owl:NamedIndividual ;    rdf:type :GermanicLanguage ;    rdfs:label "English" .:Spanish a owl:NamedIndividual ;    rdf:type :RomanceLanguage ;    rdfs:label "Spanish" .:Person a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Person" .:Human a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Human" ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Person .:Script a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Script" .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: language. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/language#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .:Language rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Language" ;    rdfs:comment "A system of communication used by a particular community or country." .:NaturalLanguage rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Language ;    rdfs:label "Natural Language" ;    rdfs:comment "Languages that have developed naturally in use by people." .:ProgrammingLanguage rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Language ;    rdfs:label "Programming Language" ;    rdfs:comment "Formal languages designed to communicate instructions to a machine, particularly a computer." .:LanguageFamily rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Language Family" ;    rdfs:comment "A group of languages related through descent from a common ancestral language." .:belongsToFamily rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :NaturalLanguage ;    rdfs:range :LanguageFamily ;    rdfs:label "belongs to family" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the language family a natural language belongs to." .:hasDialects rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :NaturalLanguage ;    rdfs:range :Dialect ;    rdfs:label "has dialects" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the dialects of a natural language." .:Dialect rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Dialect" ;    rdfs:comment "A regional or social variety of a language distinguished by pronunciation, grammar, or vocabulary." .:Syntax rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Syntax" ;    rdfs:comment "The set of rules, principles, and processes that govern the structure of sentences in a given language." .:Semantics rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Semantics" ;    rdfs:comment "The meaning of linguistic expressions and sentences." .:hasSyntax rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Language ;    rdfs:range :Syntax ;    rdfs:label "has syntax" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the syntax associated with a language." .:hasSemantics rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Language ;    rdfs:range :Semantics ;    rdfs:label "has semantics" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the semantics associated with a language." .:English rdf:type :NaturalLanguage ;    rdfs:label "English" .:IndoEuropean rdf:type :LanguageFamily ;    rdfs:label "Indo-European" .:belongsToFamily :English :IndoEuropean .:Python rdf:type :ProgrammingLanguage ;    rdfs:label "Python" .:hasSyntax :Python :Syntax .:hasSemantics :Python :Semantics .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: language.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix : <http://example.org/language#> .:Language rdf:type owl:Class ;          rdfs:label "Language" ;          rdfs:comment "A system of communication used by a particular community or country." .:NaturalLanguage rdf:type owl:Class ;                 rdfs:subClassOf :Language ;                 rdfs:label "Natural Language" ;                 rdfs:comment "Languages that have developed naturally in human communities." .:ProgrammingLanguage rdf:type owl:Class ;                     rdfs:subClassOf :Language ;                     rdfs:label "Programming Language" ;                     rdfs:comment "Formal languages comprising a set of instructions that produce various kinds of output." .:Script rdf:type owl:Class ;        rdfs:label "Script" ;        rdfs:comment "A system of writing used for a particular language." .:Dialect rdf:type owl:Class ;         rdfs:subClassOf :Language ;         rdfs:label "Dialect" ;         rdfs:comment "A particular form of a language which is peculiar to a specific region or social group." .:English rdf:type owl:NamedIndividual ;        rdf:type :NaturalLanguage ;        rdfs:label "English" .:Python rdf:type owl:NamedIndividual ;        rdf:type :ProgrammingLanguage ;        rdfs:label "Python" .:LatinScript rdf:type owl:NamedIndividual ;             rdf:type :Script ;             rdfs:label "Latin Script" .:hasScript rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;           rdfs:domain :Language ;           rdfs:range :Script ;           rdfs:label "has script" ;           rdfs:comment "Defines the script used by a language." .:English :hasScript :LatinScript .```
